Which row the column headers are on (starting at 1, 0 means no headers)
Which row the data starts on (starting at 1, must be greater than headerRow)
the delimiter to split the file by

member.name: M:ODMSDLConfigWiz.Common.ProcessLine(System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Splits a line of text at a delimiter, using " as text delimiters which prevent text containing the delimiter from being split.
"this, should, all, stay, together", this, "should", not when split using , as a delimiter will return 1 this, should, all, stay, together 2 this 3 should 4 not
member.param: a line of text from the file
member.returns: The array of split strings
